sentences.en: But Mr Fenty's brusque style has alienated many of his constituents.
sentences.cn: 但是芬提莽撞的风格疏远了很多选民.

sentences.en: Dedicated to all those who are or have been lonely and alienated.
sentences.cn: 致力于为所有这些谁是或曾经是孤独和疏远.

sentences.en: He felt alienated from his peers.
He had alienated many people with his tactless remarks.
sentences.cn: 他说话没个轻重，得罪了许多人。

sentences.en: He had done too many boisterous things -- alienated too many people.
sentences.cn: 他干了太多刺激人的事情 ― 得罪人太多啦.

sentences.en: Her increasing belligerence alienated her from her old friends.
sentences.cn: 她的日益增长的好战性使她和她的老朋友们疏远了.

sentences.en: His behavior alienated him and his brother.
sentences.cn: 他的行为使他跟哥哥疏远了。
他的行为使他疏远了朋友.

sentences.en: His bellicose disposition alienated his friend.
sentences.cn: 他生性好斗,他的朋友们都疏远了他.

sentences.en: His coolness has alienated his friends.
sentences.cn: 他的冷淡使他的朋友们疏远他.

sentences.en: She was alienated from her friend by her foolish behavior.
sentences.cn: 她的愚蠢行为使她的朋友同她疏远了.

sentences.en: Since he had alienated Aileen, he was quite alone.
sentences.cn: 自从他疏远了爱玲以后, 他是很孤单的.

sentences.en: The property of enemy was alienated during the war.
The woman's unsociable behaviour gradually alienated her from all her friends.
sentences.cn: 那个妇女不友好的行为渐渐地使她和所有朋友疏远了.

sentences.en: They had alienated the one man who knew the business.
sentences.cn: 他们弄僵了同那个唯一懂行的人之间的关系。

sentences.en: Young people are often alienated from the ideas of their parents.
sentences.cn: 年轻人的想法经常与他们父母不合.

words.tran_cn: 异化；疏远；转让；[内科] 精神错乱；间离效果（alienation effect）
疏远的,被忽视的,无家可归的
自我封闭的,狭隘的,冷漠的

trans.tran_cn: 使疏远( alienate的过去式和过去分词 )，使不友好，转让，让渡（财产等）
